title: Program will not open.
author: zactill
body_snippet:
Love the program, rely on it honestly. For whatever reason I continually have the confCons.xml issue where it goes to null and the program will not open. I copy a confCons.xml backup for my connections and uninstall the program. I reinstall and import my connections and it works fine for the day. When I come back the next day the program will not open and I have to do this process all over again, every day.

## Current Behavior
Program will not open, confCons.xml goes null.

## Possible Sol...

comments.snippet: After you have imported and you save the config after...with or without making a change does that work?
comments.author: nmat

comments.snippet:
I have the same problem. Under certain circumstances confCons.xml will be destroyed and I must restore this file too. But reinstalling of mRemoteNG is not necessary in my case

Version: 1.77.1.27654
comments.author: GeriZ

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
comments.author: robertpopa22
